p: Finally, to hear directly from those who work with plastic packaging in a professional capacity – whether in terms of labeling, sales, design, or campaigning – we disseminated an industry survey posing questions specifically around language and labeling practices for plastic packaging (see Appendix A for the list of questions). We received 28 responses, with respondents ranging from retailer and manufacturer representatives to business owners, packaging designers, and consultants, among others. The responses to the survey, though relatively small in size, were included in Corpus 1 along with the public guidance and the supermarket website texts. Table 1 shows the final composition of Corpus 1.
